review: Needs a better wifi signal. Had to get a Wifi Extender.
author: Brian

review: The stick is incredible, you offer so many apps, videos, tv shows, movies, on and on.  I got it before this terrible winter, and have been entertained each day, it a totally different way, thank you , Amazon.

review: Works great!  Easy for the kids to use too!
author: Kody M.

review: Works well, but interface takes getting used to compared to Apple TV. The latter is more intuitive and easier to navigate. That said, still very good product.
author: Neal Pratt
